document_data.mainbody:
'''Toasted bread''' or simply '''toast''', was one of the simplest handfoods found in the [[Realms]]. It consisted of cooked [[bread]], sometimes [[seed-bread]], often smothered in spreads or soaked in sauces.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice||4}}
{{quote|''In this house thieves are melted like butter and spread onto toast!''|[[Cleric]] [[Hope (cleric)|Hope]], manically screaming at her rescuers.}}
document_data.Description:
Toasted bread was often eaten topped with soft [[butter]], or [[gravy]],{{Cite digital book/Song of the Saurials||15}} Specialized toasting implements were also used in the coastal town of [[Spandeliyon]] in [[Altumbel]]. These [[toasting iron]]s were used to affix bread and [[cheese]] together to be fire-roasted.

It was also known to be served as a side for various dishes, like bowls of simple [[broth]], or plated among morningfeast foods like [[egg]]s, [[ham]], [[bacon]], [[apple]]s, and [[melon]]s, or topped with sliced fried [[sausage]], or [[stirge on toast|stirge]], like they did in [[Waterdeep]] and [[Suzail]]. The dish called [[tharval-and-dleem]] was a spread made with [[tharval]], a type of tiny fish, mashed and smothered over toasted bread.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}} Guests of [[The Jester's Pride]] in [[Julkoun]] could try another fish variation of toast – topped with river [[trout]] with a sauce of [[lemon]], [[cream]], and [[pepper]]. [[Tabra's]] [[festhall]] and [[The Riverman]] inn in [[Blackfeather Bridge]] served buttered toast topped with mushrooms and [[oyster]]s to its guest and the simple dish was recommended by [[Volothamp Geddarm]] as a highlight of the menu.

Toast was also known to be a simple dessert treat when it was served crusted with [[sugar]], notably seen in the [[Feywild]], or covered in butter and [[cinnamon]], as was popular among the guests of [[The Copper Cup]] in Waterdeep.
document_data.History: During his visits to [[Earth]], [[Elminster]] and the the Wizards Three imbibed squares of toast, something that was presumed to be a type of bread from that world.{{Cite dragon/196/Three Wizards Too Many|84}}
